00080 UINT16* GetActionItemName( OBJECTTYPE *pItem )
00081 {
00082       if( !pItem || pItem->usItem != ACTION_ITEM )
00083             return NULL;
00084       if( pItem->bActionValue != ACTION_ITEM_BLOW_UP )
00085       {
00086             switch( pItem->bActionValue )
00087             {
00088                   case ACTION_ITEM_OPEN_DOOR:                                             return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_OPEN ];
00089                   case ACTION_ITEM_CLOSE_DOOR:                                      return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_CLOSE ];
00090                   case ACTION_ITEM_SMALL_PIT:                                             return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_SMPIT ];
00091                   case ACTION_ITEM_LARGE_PIT:                                             return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_LGPIT ];
00092                   case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_DOOR:                                     return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_TOGGLE_DOOR ];
00093                   case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION1:                            return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION1 ];
00094                   case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION2:                            return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION2 ];
00095                   case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION3:                            return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION3 ];
00096                   case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION4:                            return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION4 ];
00097                   case ACTION_ITEM_ENTER_BROTHEL:                                   return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_ENTER_BROTHEL ];
00098                   case ACTION_ITEM_EXIT_BROTHEL:                                    return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_EXIT_BROTHEL ];
00099                   case ACTION_ITEM_KINGPIN_ALARM:                                   return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_KINGPIN_ALARM ];
00100                   case ACTION_ITEM_SEX:                                                               return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_SEX ];
00101                   case ACTION_ITEM_REVEAL_ROOM:                                     return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_REVEAL_ROOM ];
00102                   case ACTION_ITEM_LOCAL_ALARM:                                     return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_LOCAL_ALARM ];
00103                   case ACTION_ITEM_GLOBAL_ALARM:                                    return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_GLOBAL_ALARM ];
00104                   case ACTION_ITEM_KLAXON:                                                      return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_KLAXON ];
00105                   case ACTION_ITEM_UNLOCK_DOOR:                                     return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_UNLOCK_DOOR ];
00106                   case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_LOCK:                                     return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_TOGGLE_LOCK ];
00107                   case ACTION_ITEM_UNTRAP_DOOR:                                     return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_UNTRAP_DOOR ];
00108                   case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_PRESSURE_ITEMS:         return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_TOGGLE_PRESSURE_ITEMS ];
00109                   case ACTION_ITEM_MUSEUM_ALARM:                                    return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_MUSEUM_ALARM ];
00110                   case ACTION_ITEM_BLOODCAT_ALARM:                            return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_BLOODCAT_ALARM ];
00111                   default:                                                                                                    return NULL;
00112             }
00113       }
00114       else switch( pItem->usBombItem )
00115       {
00116             case STUN_GRENADE:                  return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_STUN ];
00117             case SMOKE_GRENADE:                 return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_SMOKE ];
00118             case TEARGAS_GRENADE:         return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_TEARGAS ];
00119             case MUSTARD_GRENADE:         return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_MUSTARD ];
00120             case HAND_GRENADE:                  return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_SMALL ];
00121             case TNT:                                             return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_MEDIUM ];
00122             case C4:                                              return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_LARGE ];
00123             case MINE:                                      return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_MINE ];
00124             case TRIP_FLARE:                    return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_FLARE ];
00125             case TRIP_KLAXON:                   return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_TRIP_KLAXON ];
00126             case BIG_TEAR_GAS:                  return gszActionItemDesc[ ACTIONITEM_BIG_TEAR_GAS ];
00127             default:                                              return NULL;
00128       }
00129 }

00233 void ShowItemStatsPanel()
00234 {
00235       ShowEditorButtons( FIRST_ITEMSTATS_BUTTON, LAST_ITEMSTATS_BUTTON );
00236       if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MERCS || !gpItem )
00237             HideEditorButton( ITEMSTATS_HIDDEN_BTN );
00238       gfShowItemStatsPanel = TRUE;
00239 }
00240 
00241 void HideItemStatsPanel()
00242 {
00243       HideEditorButtons( FIRST_ITEMSTATS_BUTTON, LAST_ITEMSTATS_BUTTON );
00244       SpecifyItemToEdit( NULL, -1 );
00245       gfShowItemStatsPanel = FALSE;
00246 }

00258 void ExecuteItemStatsCmd( UINT8 ubAction )
00259 {
00260       switch( ubAction )
00261       {
00262             case ITEMSTATS_APPLY:
00263                   if( gpItem && gpItem->usItem == ACTION_ITEM )
00264                   {
00265                         ExtractAndUpdateActionItemsGUI();
00266                   }
00267                   else if( gpItem && gpItem->usItem == SWITCH )
00268                   {
00269                         ExtractAndUpdateTriggersGUI();
00270                   }
00271                   else if( gpItem && gpItem->usItem == OWNERSHIP )
00272                   {
00273                         ExtractAndUpdateOwnershipGUI();
00274                   }
00275                   else switch( gbEditingMode )
00276                   {
00277                         case EDITING_GUNS:                        ExtractAndUpdateGunGUI();                             break;
00278                         case EDITING_AMMO:                        ExtractAndUpdateAmmoGUI();                      break;
00279                         case EDITING_ARMOUR:                ExtractAndUpdateArmourGUI();              break;
00280                         case EDITING_EQUIPMENT:       ExtractAndUpdateEquipGUI();                     break;
00281                         case EDITING_EXPLOSIVES:      ExtractAndUpdateExplosivesGUI();    break;
00282                         case EDITING_MONEY:                       ExtractAndUpdateMoneyGUI();                     break;
00283                         case EDITING_KEYS:                        ExtractAndUpdateKeysGUI();                      break;
00284                   }
00285                   SetActiveField( 0 );
00286                   gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00287                   break;
00288             case ITEMSTATS_CANCEL:
00289                   SpecifyItemToEdit( gpItem, gsItemGridNo );
00290                   SetActiveField( 0 );
00291                   break;
00292             case ITEMSTATS_DEFAULT:
00293                   break;
00294             case ITEMSTATS_DELETE:
00295                   DeleteSelectedItem();
00296                   break;
00297             case ITEMSTATS_SHOW:
00298                   ShowSelectedItem();
00299                   break;
00300             case ITEMSTATS_HIDE:
00301                   HideSelectedItem();
00302                   break;
00303       }
00304 }
00305 
00306 void RemoveItemGUI()
00307 {
00308       if( !gpItem )
00309             return;
00310       if( TextInputMode() )
00311             KillTextInputMode();
00312       HideEditorButton( ITEMSTATS_HIDDEN_BTN );
00313       RemoveGameTypeFlags();
00314       if( gpItem && gpItem->usItem == ACTION_ITEM )
00315       {
00316             RemoveActionItemsGUI();
00317       }
00318       else if( gpItem && gpItem->usItem == SWITCH )
00319       {
00320             RemoveTriggersGUI();
00321       }
00322       else if( gpItem && gpItem->usItem == OWNERSHIP )
00323       {
00324             RemoveOwnershipGUI();
00325       }
00326       else switch( gbEditingMode )
00327       {
00328             case EDITING_GUNS:                        RemoveGunGUI();                           break;
00329             case EDITING_AMMO:                        RemoveAmmoGUI();                    break;
00330             case EDITING_ARMOUR:                RemoveArmourGUI();                  break;
00331             case EDITING_EQUIPMENT:       RemoveEquipGUI();                   break;
00332             case EDITING_EXPLOSIVES:      RemoveExplosivesGUI();  break;
00333             case EDITING_MONEY:                       RemoveMoneyGUI();                   break;
00334             case EDITING_KEYS:                        RemoveKeysGUI();                    break;
00335       }
00336 }
00337 
00338 void SpecifyItemToEdit( OBJECTTYPE *pItem, INT32 iMapIndex )
00339 {
00340       //Set the global item pointer to point to the new item
00341       if( gpItem == pItem )
00342             return;
00343       if( gpItem != pItem )
00344       {
00345             ExecuteItemStatsCmd( ITEMSTATS_APPLY );
00346             RemoveItemGUI();
00347             gpItem = pItem;
00348             if( gpItemPool )
00349             {
00350                   gpEditingItemPool = gpItemPool;
00351             }
00352             gsItemGridNo = (INT16)iMapIndex;
00353       }
00354       else
00355             RemoveItemGUI();
00356 
00357       gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00358 
00359       if( !gpItem )
00360       {
00361             //Hide all edit features.
00362             gbEditingMode = EDITING_NOTHING;
00363             gsItemGridNo = -1;
00364             return;
00365       }
00366 
00367       //Setup the text mode
00368       InitTextInputModeWithScheme( DEFAULT_SCHEME );
00369 
00370       if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_ITEMS )
00371             ShowEditorButton( ITEMSTATS_HIDDEN_BTN );
00372 
00373       //Determine the type of item so that we can determine the dynamic editing mode.
00374       AddUserInputField( NULL );
00375 
00376       SetupGameTypeFlags();
00377 
00378       if( Item[ gpItem->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
00379       {
00380             gbEditingMode = EDITING_MONEY;
00381             SetupMoneyGUI();
00382       }
00383       else if( gpItem->usItem == ACTION_ITEM )
00384       {
00385             gbEditingMode = EDITING_ACTIONITEMS;
00386             SetupActionItemsGUI();
00387             HideEditorButton( ITEMSTATS_HIDDEN_BTN );
00388       }
00389       else if( gpItem->usItem == SWITCH )
00390       {
00391             gbEditingMode = EDITING_TRIGGERS;
00392             SetupTriggersGUI();
00393             HideEditorButton( ITEMSTATS_HIDDEN_BTN );
00394       }
00395       else if( gpItem->usItem == OWNERSHIP )
00396       {
00397             gbEditingMode = EDITING_OWNERSHIP;
00398             SetupOwnershipGUI();
00399             HideEditorButton( ITEMSTATS_HIDDEN_BTN );
00400       }
00401       else switch( Item[ gpItem->usItem ].usItemClass )
00402       {
00403             case IC_GUN:
00404                   gbEditingMode = EDITING_GUNS;
00405                   SetupGunGUI();
00406                   break;
00407             case IC_AMMO:
00408                   gbEditingMode = EDITING_AMMO;
00409                   SetupAmmoGUI();
00410                   break;
00411             case IC_ARMOUR:
00412                   gbEditingMode = EDITING_ARMOUR;
00413                   SetupArmourGUI();
00414                   break;
00415             case IC_MEDKIT:
00416             case IC_KIT:
00417             case IC_MISC:
00418             case IC_FACE:
00419             case IC_BLADE:
00420             case IC_LAUNCHER:
00421             case IC_THROWING_KNIFE:
00422             case IC_MONEY:
00423                   gbEditingMode = EDITING_EQUIPMENT;
00424                   SetupEquipGUI();
00425                   break;
00426             case IC_THROWN:
00427             case IC_GRENADE:
00428             case IC_EXPLOSV:
00429             case IC_BOMB:
00430                   gbEditingMode = EDITING_EXPLOSIVES;
00431                   SetupExplosivesGUI();
00432                   break;
00433             case IC_KEY:
00434                   gbEditingMode = EDITING_KEYS;
00435                   SetupKeysGUI();
00436                   break;
00437             case IC_PUNCH:
00438                   if ( gpItem->usItem != NOTHING)
00439                   {
00440                         gbEditingMode = EDITING_EQUIPMENT;
00441                         SetupEquipGUI();
00442                         break;
00443                   }
00444                   // else fall through and act as nothing
00445             case IC_NONE:
00446                   gbEditingMode = EDITING_NOTHING;
00447                   if( !(gpItem->fFlags & OBJECT_UNDROPPABLE) )
00448                         gbEditingMode = EDITING_DROPPABLE;
00449                   break;
00450             default:
00451                   gbEditingMode = EDITING_NOT_YET_IMPLEMENTED;
00452                   break;
00453       }
00454       if( gpItemPool )
00455       {
00456             if( gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].bVisible == INVISIBLE )
00457             {
00458                   UnclickEditorButton( ITEMSTATS_HIDDEN_BTN );
00459                   ShowSelectedItem();
00460             }
00461             else
00462             {
00463                   ClickEditorButton( ITEMSTATS_HIDDEN_BTN );
00464                   HideSelectedItem();
00465             }
00466       }
00467 }
00468 
00469 //called from the taskbar renderer.
00470 void UpdateItemStatsPanel()
00471 {
00472       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00473       SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY2 );
00474       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00475       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
00476       if( gpItem && iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_ITEMS && 
00477                   gbEditingMode != EDITING_TRIGGERS && gbEditingMode != EDITING_ACTIONITEMS )
00478       {
00479             mprintf( 500, 366, L"Toggle hide flag" );
00480       }
00481       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00482       switch( gbEditingMode )
00483       {
00484             case EDITING_NOTHING:
00485                   if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_ITEMS )
00486                         mprintf( 520, 400, L"No item selected." );
00487                   else
00488                   {
00489                         mprintf( 500, 390, L"Slot available for" );
00490                         mprintf( 500, 400, L"random generation." );
00491                   }
00492                   return;
00493             case EDITING_KEYS:
00494                   if( !gpEditingItemPool )
00495                   {
00496                         mprintf( 500, 400, L"Keys not editable." );
00497                         return;
00498                   }
00499                   break;
00500             case EDITING_OWNERSHIP:
00501                   mprintf( 512, 384, L"ProfileID of owner" );
00502                   return;
00503             case EDITING_NOT_YET_IMPLEMENTED:
00504                   mprintf( 500, 400, L"Item class not implemented." );
00505                   return;
00506             case EDITING_DROPPABLE:
00507                   mprintf( 500, 400, L"Slot locked as empty.");
00508                   return;
00509             case EDITING_GUNS:
00510                   mprintf( 512, 384, L"Status" );
00511                   mprintf( 512, 404, L"Rounds" );
00512                   mprintf( 512, 424, L"Trap Level" );
00513                   break;
00514             case EDITING_AMMO:
00515                   mprintf( 512, 384, L"Quantity" );
00516                   mprintf( 512, 404, L"Trap Level" );
00517                   break;
00518             case EDITING_ARMOUR:
00519             case EDITING_EQUIPMENT:
00520                   mprintf( 512, 384, L"Status" );
00521                   mprintf( 512, 404, L"Trap Level" );
00522                   break;
00523             case EDITING_EXPLOSIVES:
00524                   mprintf( 512, 380, L"Status" );
00525                   mprintf( 512, 404, L"Quantity" );
00526                   mprintf( 512, 424, L"Trap Level" );
00527                   break;
00528             case EDITING_MONEY:
00529                   mprintf( 532, 384, L"Dollars" );
00530                   break;
00531             case EDITING_ACTIONITEMS:
00532                   mprintf( 512, 369, L"Status" );
00533                   mprintf( 512, 389, L"Trap Level" );
00534                   break;
00535             case EDITING_TRIGGERS:
00536                   mprintf( 512, 369, L"Trap Level");
00537                   mprintf( 512, 389, L"Tolerance" );
00538                   if( gpEditingItemPool && gpItem->bFrequency >= PANIC_FREQUENCY_3 && gpItem->bFrequency <= PANIC_FREQUENCY )
00539                         mprintf( 500, 407, L"Alarm Trigger" );
00540                   break;
00541       }
00542       if( gpEditingItemPool )
00543       {
00544             INT32 iPercent = 100 - gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance;
00545             if( iPercent == 100 )
00546                   SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00547             else if( iPercent >= 50 )
00548                   SetFontForeground( FONT_ORANGE );
00549             else 
00550                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00551             mprintf( 512, 444, L"Exist Chance" );
00552             mprintf( 587, 366, L"B" );
00553             mprintf( 609, 366, L"R" );
00554             mprintf( 630, 366, L"S" );
00555       }
00556       InvalidateRegion( 477, 362, 161, 97 );
00557 }
00558 
00559 void RealisticOnlyCheckboxCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00560 {
00561       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00562       {
00563             ButtonList[ giRealisticCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON | BUTTON_DIRTY);
00564             ButtonList[ giSciFiCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00565             ButtonList[ giSciFiCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00566             ButtonList[ giBothCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00567             ButtonList[ giBothCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00568             gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].usFlags &= ~(WORLD_ITEM_REALISTIC_ONLY | WORLD_ITEM_SCIFI_ONLY);
00569             gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_REALISTIC_ONLY;
00570       }
00571 }
00572 
00573 void SciFiOnlyCheckboxCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00574 {
00575       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00576       {
00577             ButtonList[ giRealisticCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00578             ButtonList[ giRealisticCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00579             ButtonList[ giSciFiCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON | BUTTON_DIRTY);
00580             ButtonList[ giBothCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00581             ButtonList[ giBothCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00582             gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].usFlags &= ~(WORLD_ITEM_REALISTIC_ONLY | WORLD_ITEM_SCIFI_ONLY);
00583             gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_SCIFI_ONLY;
00584       }
00585 }
00586 
00587 void BothModesCheckboxCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00588 {
00589       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00590       {
00591             ButtonList[ giRealisticCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00592             ButtonList[ giRealisticCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00593             ButtonList[ giSciFiCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00594             ButtonList[ giSciFiCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00595             ButtonList[ giBothCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON | BUTTON_DIRTY);
00596             gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].usFlags &= ~(WORLD_ITEM_REALISTIC_ONLY | WORLD_ITEM_SCIFI_ONLY);
00597       }
00598 }
00599 
00600 void SetupGameTypeFlags()
00601 {
00602       if( gpEditingItemPool )
00603       {
00604             giBothCheckboxButton = 
00605                   CreateCheckBoxButton(   573, 365, "EDITOR//radiobutton.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, BothModesCheckboxCallback );
00606             SetButtonFastHelpText( giBothCheckboxButton, L"Item appears in both Sci-Fi and Realistic modes. (|B)" );
00607             giRealisticCheckboxButton = 
00608                   CreateCheckBoxButton(   595, 365, "EDITOR//radiobutton.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, RealisticOnlyCheckboxCallback );
00609             SetButtonFastHelpText( giRealisticCheckboxButton, L"Item appears in |Realistic mode only." );
00610             giSciFiCheckboxButton = 
00611                   CreateCheckBoxButton(   616, 365, "EDITOR//radiobutton.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, SciFiOnlyCheckboxCallback );
00612             SetButtonFastHelpText( giSciFiCheckboxButton, L"Item appears in |Sci-Fi mode only." );
00613             
00614             if( gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_REALISTIC_ONLY )
00615                   ButtonList[ giRealisticCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON | BUTTON_DIRTY);
00616             else if( gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_SCIFI_ONLY )
00617                   ButtonList[ giSciFiCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON | BUTTON_DIRTY);
00618             else
00619                   ButtonList[ giBothCheckboxButton ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON | BUTTON_DIRTY);
00620       }
00621 }
00622 
00623 void RemoveGameTypeFlags()
00624 {
00625       if( giBothCheckboxButton != -1 )
00626       {
00627             RemoveButton( giBothCheckboxButton );
00628             giBothCheckboxButton = -1;
00629       }
00630       if( giRealisticCheckboxButton != -1 )
00631       {
00632             RemoveButton( giRealisticCheckboxButton );
00633             giRealisticCheckboxButton = -1;
00634       }
00635       if( giSciFiCheckboxButton != -1 )
00636       {
00637             RemoveButton( giSciFiCheckboxButton );
00638             giSciFiCheckboxButton = -1;
00639       }
00640 }
00641 
00642 void SetupGunGUI()
00643 {
00644       UINT16 str[20];
00645       INT16 yp;
00646       memset( gfAttachment, 0, NUM_ATTACHMENT_BUTTONS );
00647       swprintf( str, L"%d", gpItem->bGunStatus );
00648       AddTextInputField( 485, 380, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00649       swprintf( str, L"%d", gpItem->ubGunShotsLeft );
00650       AddTextInputField( 485, 400, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00651       swprintf( str, L"%d", gpItem->bTrap );
00652       AddTextInputField( 485, 420, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 2, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00653       if( gpEditingItemPool )
00654       {
00655             swprintf( str, L"%d", 100 - gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance );
00656             AddTextInputField( 485, 440, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00657       }
00658       //Attachments are a dynamic part of guns.  None, some, or all attachments could be available
00659       //for a particular weapon.  Show only the ones that we can apply to this gun.
00660       yp = 383;
00661       guiAttachmentButton[ SILENCER_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = -1;
00662       if( ValidAttachment( SILENCER, gpItem->usItem ) )
00663       {
00664             guiAttachmentButton[ SILENCER_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = 
00665                   CreateTextButton( L"SILENCER", SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_YELLOW, FONT_BLACK, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00666                   570, yp, 60, 12, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, ToggleAttachment );
00667             yp += 14;
00668             if( FindAttachment( gpItem, SILENCER ) != -1 )
00669             {
00670                   ButtonList[ guiAttachmentButton[ SILENCER_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00671                   gfAttachment[0] = TRUE;
00672             }
00673       }
00674       guiAttachmentButton[ SNIPERSCOPE_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = -1;
00675       if( ValidAttachment( SNIPERSCOPE, gpItem->usItem ) )
00676       {
00677             guiAttachmentButton[ SNIPERSCOPE_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = 
00678                   CreateTextButton( L"SNIPERSCOPE", SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_YELLOW, FONT_BLACK, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00679                   570, yp, 60, 12, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, ToggleAttachment );
00680             yp += 14;
00681             if( FindAttachment( gpItem, SNIPERSCOPE ) != -1 )
00682             {
00683                   ButtonList[ guiAttachmentButton[ SNIPERSCOPE_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00684                   gfAttachment[1] = TRUE;
00685             }
00686       }
00687       guiAttachmentButton[ LASERSCOPE_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = -1;
00688       if( ValidAttachment( LASERSCOPE, gpItem->usItem ) )
00689       {
00690             guiAttachmentButton[ LASERSCOPE_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = 
00691                   CreateTextButton( L"LASERSCOPE", SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_YELLOW, FONT_BLACK, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00692                   570, yp, 60, 12, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, ToggleAttachment );
00693             yp += 14;
00694             if( FindAttachment( gpItem, LASERSCOPE ) != -1 )
00695             {
00696                   ButtonList[ guiAttachmentButton[ LASERSCOPE_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00697                   gfAttachment[2] = TRUE;
00698             }
00699       }
00700       guiAttachmentButton[ BIPOD_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = -1;
00701       if( ValidAttachment( BIPOD, gpItem->usItem ) )
00702       {
00703             guiAttachmentButton[ BIPOD_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = 
00704                   CreateTextButton( L"BIPOD", SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_YELLOW, FONT_BLACK, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00705                   570, yp, 60, 12, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, ToggleAttachment );
00706             yp += 14;
00707             if( FindAttachment( gpItem, BIPOD ) != -1 )
00708             {
00709                   ButtonList[ guiAttachmentButton[ BIPOD_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00710                   gfAttachment[3] = TRUE;
00711             }
00712       }
00713       guiAttachmentButton[ DUCKBILL_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = -1;
00714       if( ValidAttachment( DUCKBILL, gpItem->usItem ) )
00715       {
00716             guiAttachmentButton[ DUCKBILL_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = 
00717                   CreateTextButton( L"DUCKBILL", SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_YELLOW, FONT_BLACK, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00718                   570, yp, 60, 12, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, ToggleAttachment );
00719             yp += 14;
00720             if( FindAttachment( gpItem, DUCKBILL ) != -1 )
00721             {
00722                   ButtonList[ guiAttachmentButton[ DUCKBILL_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00723                   gfAttachment[4] = TRUE;
00724             }
00725       }
00726       guiAttachmentButton[ GLAUNCHER_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = -1;
00727       if( ValidAttachment( UNDER_GLAUNCHER, gpItem->usItem ) )
00728       {
00729             guiAttachmentButton[ GLAUNCHER_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] = 
00730                   CreateTextButton( L"G-LAUNCHER", SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_YELLOW, FONT_BLACK, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00731                   570, yp, 60, 12, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, ToggleAttachment );
00732             yp += 14;
00733             if( FindAttachment( gpItem, UNDER_GLAUNCHER ) != -1 )
00734             {
00735                   ButtonList[ guiAttachmentButton[ GLAUNCHER_ATTACHMENT_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00736                   gfAttachment[5] = TRUE;
00737             }
00738       }
00739       ReEvaluateAttachmentStatii();
00740 }
00741 
00742 void RemoveGunGUI()
00743 {
00744       INT32 i;
00745       for( i = 0; i < NUM_ATTACHMENT_BUTTONS; i++ )
00746       {
00747             if( guiAttachmentButton[ i ] != -1 )
00748             {
00749                   RemoveButton( guiAttachmentButton[ i ] );
00750                   guiAttachmentButton[ i ] = -1;
00751             }
00752       }
00753 }
00754 
00755 void ExtractAndUpdateGunGUI()
00756 {
00757       INT32 i;
00758       //Update the gun status
00759       i = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 1 );
00760       if( i == -1 )
00761             i = 20 + Random( 81 );
00762       else
00763             i = min( i, 100 );
00764       gpItem->bGunStatus = (INT8)i;
00765       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 1, i );
00766       //Update the ammo
00767       i = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 2 );
00768       if( i == -1 )
00769             i = Random( 1 + Weapon[ gpItem->usItem ].ubMagSize );
00770       else
00771             i = min( i, Weapon[ gpItem->usItem ].ubMagSize );
00772       gpItem->ubGunShotsLeft = (UINT8)i;
00773       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 2, i );
00774       //Update the trap level
00775       i = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 3 );
00776       i = ( i == -1 ) ? 0 : min( i, 20 );
00777       gpItem->bTrap = (INT8)i;
00778       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 3, i );
00779       if( gpEditingItemPool )
00780       {
00781             giDefaultExistChance = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 4 );
00782             giDefaultExistChance = ( giDefaultExistChance == -1 ) ? 100 : max( 1, min( giDefaultExistChance, 100 ) );
00783             gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance = (UINT8)(100 - giDefaultExistChance );
00784             SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 4, giDefaultExistChance );
00785       }
00786 }
00787 
00788 void SetupAmmoGUI()
00789 {
00790       UINT16 str[20];
00791       swprintf( str, L"%d", gpItem->ubNumberOfObjects );
00792       AddTextInputField( 485, 380, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 1, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00793       swprintf( str, L"%d", gpItem->bTrap );
00794       AddTextInputField( 485, 400, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 2, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00795       if( gpEditingItemPool )
00796       {
00797             swprintf( str, L"%d", 100 - gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance );
00798             AddTextInputField( 485, 440, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00799       }
00800 }

00806 
00807 void ExtractAndUpdateAmmoGUI()
00808 {
00809       INT32 i;
00810       //Update the number of clips
00811       i = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 1 );
00812       if( i == -1 )
00813             i = 1 + Random( Item[ gpItem->usItem ].ubPerPocket );
00814       else
00815             i = max( 1, min( i, Item[ gpItem->usItem ].ubPerPocket ) );
00816       gpItem->ubNumberOfObjects = (UINT8)i;
00817       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 1, i );
00818       CreateItems( gpItem->usItem, 100, gpItem->ubNumberOfObjects, gpItem );
00819       //Update the trap level
00820       i = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 2 );
00821       i = ( i == -1 ) ? 0 : min( i, 20 );
00822       gpItem->bTrap = (INT8)i;
00823       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 2, i );
00824       if( gpEditingItemPool )
00825       {
00826             giDefaultExistChance = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 3 );
00827             giDefaultExistChance = ( giDefaultExistChance == -1 ) ? 100 : max( 1, min( giDefaultExistChance, 100 ) );
00828             gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance = (UINT8)(100 - giDefaultExistChance );
00829             SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 3, giDefaultExistChance );
00830       }
00831 }

00938 void SetupExplosivesGUI()
00939 {
00940       UINT16 str[20];
00941       INT16 yp;
00942       swprintf( str, L"%d", gpItem->bStatus[0] );
00943       AddTextInputField( 485, 380, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00944       swprintf( str, L"%d", gpItem->ubNumberOfObjects );
00945       AddTextInputField( 485, 400, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 1, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00946       if( Item[ gpItem->usItem ].ubPerPocket == 1 )
00947       {
00948             DisableTextField( 2 );
00949       }
00950       swprintf( str, L"%d", gpItem->bTrap );
00951       AddTextInputField( 485, 420, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 2, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00952       if( gpEditingItemPool )
00953       {
00954             swprintf( str, L"%d", 100 - gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance );
00955             AddTextInputField( 485, 440, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00956       }
00957       yp = 375;
00958       gfDetonator = FALSE;
00959       guiDetonatorButton = -1;
00960       if( ValidAttachment( DETONATOR, gpItem->usItem ) )
00961       {
00962             guiDetonatorButton = 
00963                   CreateTextButton( L"DETONATOR", SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_YELLOW, FONT_BLACK, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00964                   570, yp, 60, 12, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, ToggleDetonator );
00965             yp += 14;
00966             if( FindAttachment( gpItem, DETONATOR ) != -1 )
00967             {
00968                   ButtonList[ guiDetonatorButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00969                   gfDetonator = TRUE;
00970             }
00971       }
00972 }

00980       }
00981 }

00983 void ExtractAndUpdateExplosivesGUI()
00984 {
00985       INT32 i;
00986       //Update the explosives status
00987       i = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 1 );
00988       if( i == -1 )
00989             i = 20 + Random( 81 );
00990       else
00991             i = min( i, 100 );
00992       gpItem->bStatus[0] = (INT8)i;
00993       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 1, i );
00994       //Update the quantity
00995       if( Item[ gpItem->usItem ].ubPerPocket > 1 )
00996       {
00997             i = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 2 );
00998             if( i == -1 )
00999                   i = 1 + Random( Item[ gpItem->usItem ].ubPerPocket );
01000             else
01001                   i = max( 1, min( i, Item[ gpItem->usItem ].ubPerPocket ) );
01002             gpItem->ubNumberOfObjects = (UINT8)i;
01003             SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 2, i );
01004             CreateItems( gpItem->usItem, gpItem->bStatus[0], gpItem->ubNumberOfObjects, gpItem );
01005       }
01006       //Update the trap level
01007       i = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 3 );
01008       i = ( i == -1 ) ? 0 : min( i, 20 ); 
01009       gpItem->bTrap = (INT8)i;
01010       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 3, i );
01011       if( gpEditingItemPool )
01012       {
01013             giDefaultExistChance = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 4 );
01014             giDefaultExistChance = ( giDefaultExistChance == -1 ) ? 100 : max( 1, min( giDefaultExistChance, 100 ) );
01015             gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance = (UINT8)(100 - giDefaultExistChance );
01016             SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 4, giDefaultExistChance );
01017       }
01018 }

01038             i = Random( 20000 );
01039       else
01040             i = max( 1, min( i, 20000 ) );

01042       gpItem->bStatus[0] = 100;
01043       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 1, i );
01044       if( gpEditingItemPool )
01045       {
01046             giDefaultExistChance = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 2 );
01047             giDefaultExistChance = ( giDefaultExistChance == -1 ) ? 100 : max( 1, min( giDefaultExistChance, 100 ) );

01067 
01068 void OwnershipGroupButtonCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01069 {
01070       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01071       {
01072             InitPopupMenu( btn->IDNum, OWNERSHIPGROUP_POPUP, DIR_UPLEFT );
01073       }
01074 }

01149 void ExtractAndUpdateActionItemsGUI()
01150 {
01151       INT32 i;
01152       //Update the equipment status
01153       i = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 1 );
01154       if( i == -1 )
01155             i = 20 + Random( 81 );
01156       else
01157             i = min( i, 100 );
01158       gpItem->bStatus[0] = (INT8)i;
01159       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 1, i );
01160       //Update the trap level
01161       i = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 2 );
01162       i = ( i == -1 ) ? 0 : min( i, 20 );
01163       if( i != gpItem->bTrap )
01164             gbDefaultBombTrapLevel = (INT8)i;
01165       gpItem->bTrap = (INT8)i;
01166       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 2, i );
01167 
01168       if( gpEditingItemPool )
01169       {
01170             giDefaultExistChance = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 3 );
01171             giDefaultExistChance = ( giDefaultExistChance == -1 ) ? 100 : max( 1, min( giDefaultExistChance, 100 ) );
01172             gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance = (UINT8)(100 - giDefaultExistChance );
01173             SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 3, giDefaultExistChance );
01174       }
01175 }

01202       swprintf( str, L"%d", gpItem->ubTolerance );
01203       AddTextInputField( 485, 385, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
01204       if( gpEditingItemPool )
01205       {
01206             swprintf( str, L"%d", 100 - gWorldItems[ gpEditingItemPool->iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance );
01207             AddTextInputField( 485, 440, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
01208             if( gpItem->bFrequency <= PANIC_FREQUENCY && gpItem->bFrequency >= PANIC_FREQUENCY_3 )
01209             {
01210                   giAlarmTriggerButton = 
01211                         CreateCheckBoxButton(   485, 405, "EDITOR//smCheckBox.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, AlarmTriggerCheckboxCallback );
01212                   SetButtonFastHelpText( giAlarmTriggerButton, L"If the panic trigger is an alarm trigger,\nenemies won't attempt to use it if they\nare already aware of your presence.");
01213                   if( gpItem->fFlags & OBJECT_ALARM_TRIGGER )
01214                         ButtonList[ giAlarmTriggerButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01215             }
01216       }
01217 }

01253 
01254 void ToggleAttachment( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01255 {
01256       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01257       {
01258             INT32 i;
01259             UINT16 usAttachment;
01260             OBJECTTYPE temp;
01261             for( i = 0; i < NUM_ATTACHMENT_BUTTONS; i++ )
01262             {     //Loop through and find the button that was just modified
01263                   switch( i )
01264                   {
01265                         case 0: usAttachment = SILENCER;                      break;
01266                         case 1: usAttachment = SNIPERSCOPE;             break;
01267                         case 2: usAttachment = LASERSCOPE;              break;
01268                         case 3:     usAttachment = BIPOD;                                 break;
01269                         case 4: usAttachment = DUCKBILL;                      break;
01270                         case 5: usAttachment = UNDER_GLAUNCHER;   break;
01271                   }
01272                   if( guiAttachmentButton[ i ] != -1 && btn == ButtonList[ guiAttachmentButton[ i ] ] )
01273                   {     //Found it, now check the state of the button.
01274                         if( !gfAttachment[ i ] )
01275                         {
01276                               gfAttachment[ i ] = TRUE;
01277                               btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01278                               CreateItem( usAttachment, gpItem->bGunStatus, &temp );
01279                               AttachObject( NULL, gpItem, &temp );
01280                         }
01281                         else
01282                         { //Button is out, so remove the attachment
01283                               INT8 slot;
01284                               gfAttachment[ i ] = FALSE;
01285                               btn->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01286                               slot = FindAttachment( gpItem, usAttachment );
01287                               if( slot != -1 )
01288                                     RemoveAttachment( gpItem, slot, &temp );
01289                         }
01290                   }
01291             }
01292             ReEvaluateAttachmentStatii();
01293       }
01294 }
01295 
01296 void ToggleCeramicPlates( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01297 {
01298       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01299       {
01300             OBJECTTYPE temp;
01301             gfCeramicPlates ^= TRUE;
01302             if( gfCeramicPlates )
01303             {
01304                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01305                   CreateItem( CERAMIC_PLATES, gpItem->bStatus[0], &temp );
01306                   AttachObject( NULL, gpItem, &temp );
01307             }
01308             else
01309             {
01310                   INT8 slot;
01311                   btn->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01312                   slot = FindAttachment( gpItem, CERAMIC_PLATES );
01313                   if( slot != -1 )
01314                         RemoveAttachment( gpItem, slot, &temp );
01315             }
01316       }
01317 }

01319 void ToggleDetonator( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )

01327                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01328                   CreateItem( DETONATOR, gpItem->bStatus[0], &temp );
01329                   AttachObject( NULL, gpItem, &temp );
01330             }
01331             else
01332             { //Button is out, so remove the attachment
01333                   INT8 slot;
01334                   gfDetonator = FALSE;
01335                   btn->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01336                   slot = FindAttachment( gpItem, DETONATOR );
01337                   if( slot != -1 )
01338                         RemoveAttachment( gpItem, slot, &temp );
01339             }
01340       }
01341 }

01485 
01486 void UpdateActionItem( INT8 bActionItemIndex )
01487 {
01488       gbActionItemIndex = bActionItemIndex; //used for future new actionitems as the default.
01489 
01490       if( !gpItemPool || !gpItem )
01491             return;
01492 
01493       //If the previous item was a pit, remove it before changing it
01494       if( gpItem->usItem == ACTION_ITEM )
01495       {
01496             if( gpItem->bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_SMALL_PIT )
01497                   Remove3X3Pit( gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].sGridNo );
01498             else if( gpItem->bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_LARGE_PIT )
01499                   Remove5X5Pit( gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].sGridNo );
01500       }
01501 
01502       ChangeActionItem( gpItem, gbActionItemIndex );
01503       SpecifyButtonText( guiActionItemButton,   GetActionItemName( gpItem ) );
01504 
01505       //If the new item is a pit, add it so we can see how it looks.
01506       if( gpItem->usItem == ACTION_ITEM )
01507       {
01508             if( gpItem->bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_SMALL_PIT )
01509                   Add3X3Pit( gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].sGridNo );
01510             else if( gpItem->bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_LARGE_PIT )
01511                   Add5X5Pit( gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].sGridNo );
01512       }
01513 }
01514 
01515 void ReEvaluateAttachmentStatii()
01516 {
01517       INT32 i;
01518       UINT16 usAttachment;
01519       for( i = 0; i < NUM_ATTACHMENT_BUTTONS; i++ )
01520       {
01521             if( guiAttachmentButton[ i ] != -1 && !( ButtonList[ guiAttachmentButton[ i ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ) )
01522             { //if button exists and button isn't clicked
01523                   switch( i )
01524                   {
01525                         case 0: usAttachment = SILENCER;                      break;
01526                         case 1: usAttachment = SNIPERSCOPE;             break;
01527                         case 2: usAttachment = LASERSCOPE;              break;
01528                         case 3:     usAttachment = BIPOD;                                 break;
01529                         case 4: usAttachment = DUCKBILL;                      break;
01530                         case 5: usAttachment = UNDER_GLAUNCHER;   break;
01531                   }
01532                   if( ValidItemAttachment( gpItem, usAttachment, TRUE ) )
01533                         EnableButton( guiAttachmentButton[ i ] );
01534                   else
01535                         DisableButton( guiAttachmentButton[ i ] );
01536             }
01537       }
01538 }
